result.ga: An bhfuil tú ar buile liom
result.orig: An bhfuil tú ar buile liom
result.html: An bhfuil tú ar buile liomAre you mad at me?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil tú ar buile liomAre you mad at me?

result.eng: She was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.
result.ga: Bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déanta
result.orig: Bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déanta
result.html: Bhí sí ar buile nuair a chuala sí nach raibh an obair déantaShe was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sí ar buile nuair a ċuala sí naċ raiḃ an obair déantaShe was mad when she heard the work hadn't been done.

result.ga: Tá mé ag dul as mo mheabhair
result.orig: Tá mé ag dul as mo mheabhair
result.html: Tá mé ag dul as mo mheabhairI am going mad.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag dul as mo ṁeaḃairI am going mad.

result.eng: As part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.
result.ga: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealt
result.orig: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealt
result.html: Mar chuid den uisce faoi thalamh lofa seo cuireadh an prionsa i dteach na ngealtAs part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.
result.ponchtml: Mar ċuid den uisce faoi ṫalaṁ lofa seo cuireaḋ an prionsa i dteaċ na ngealtAs part of this dirty conspiracy, the prince was put in the mad house.

result.eng: Her family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ga: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.orig: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá am
result.html: Bhí an fhearg ar shiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an ḟearg ar ẛiúl dá muintir eadar an dá amHer family stopped being mad at her in the meantime.
